entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 12:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.
